        }
        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            $options[CURLOPT_USERPWD] = "$this->username:$this->password";
        }
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $k => $v) {
                $options[$k] = $v;
            }
        }
        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $options);
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if ($curl_handle === null) {
            $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        }
        if ($response === null) {
            $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        }
        $this->response = $response;
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = [];
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        $headers = explode("\r\n", substr($response, 0, $header_size));
        foreach ($headers as $header) {
            if (strpos($header, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $header, 2);
                $this->response_headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false) {
        $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $response);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->response;
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }
        return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

Task Description: Implement a class for interacting with a pretreatment API service that handles task processing and querying, using HTTP requests with Guzzle client in PHP.

Class Description: The Pretreat class provides functionality to submit tasks for processing and query their status through an API service. It handles request signing, parameter preparation, and response processing.

Attributes:

Attribute1: Config $config - Configuration object containing service settings like timeout, service name, and endpoint URLs

Methods:

Method1: __construct(Config $config) -> void - Initializes the Pretreat instance with configuration. Throws an exception if processNotifyUrl is not configured.

Method2: process(array $tasks, array $optionalParams = []) -> array - Submits tasks for processing. Takes an array of tasks and optional parameters, returns the API response as an associative array.

Method3: query(array $taskIds, string $path) -> array|bool - Queries the status of tasks by their IDs. Returns an array of tasks if successful, or false on failure.
wrong_result:
<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class Pretreat {
    private $config;

    public function __construct(Config $config) {
        $this->config = $config;
        if (empty($this->config->processNotifyUrl)) {
            throw new \InvalidArgumentException("processNotifyUrl is not configured");
        }
    }

    public function process(array $tasks, array $optionalParams = []) {
        $params = array_merge([
            'tasks' => $tasks,
            'timestamp' => time(),
            'sign' => $this->generateSign($tasks)
        ], $optionalParams);

        $client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $this->config->endpoint,
            'timeout' => $this->config->timeout,
        ]);

        try {
            $response = $client->post($this->config->processPath, [
                'json' => $params
            ]);
            return json_decode($response->getBody(), true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return [];
        }
    }

    public function query(array $taskIds, string $path) {
        $params = [
            'task_ids' => implode(',', $taskIds),
            'timestamp' => time(),
            'sign' => $this->generateSign($taskIds)
        ];

        $client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $this->config->endpoint,
            'timeout' => $this->config->timeout,
        ]);

        try {
            $response = $client->get($path, [
                'query' => $params
            ]);
            $data = json_decode($response->getBody(), true);
            return is_array($data) ? $data : false;
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            return false;
        }
    }

    private function generateSign(array $data) {
        ksort($data);
        $string = http_build_query($data);
        return md5($string . $this->config->secretKey);
    }
}

class FetchConversionRate {
    private int $baseCurrencyId;
    private CurrencyRepository $currencyRepository;
    private ConversionRateRepository $conversionRateRepository;

        $this->baseCurrencyId = $baseCurrencyId;

    public function handle(CurrencyRepository $currencyRepository, ConversionRateRepository $conversionRateRepository): void {
        $this->currencyRepository = $currencyRepository;
        $this->conversionRateRepository = $conversionRateRepository;

                $data = json_decode($response->getBody(), true);

                if (isset($data['rate'])) {
                    $this->conversionRateRepository->save($this->baseCurrencyId, $currency->getId(), $data['rate']);
                }
            } catch (\Exception $e) {
                // Log error or handle failure
            }
        }
    }
}

        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            $this->responseClientError = $e->getMessage();
            $this->responseClientInfo = ['exception' => $e->getMessage(), 'code' => $e->getCode()];
            if ($this->logger) {
                $this->logger->error('HTTP Client Error', ['message' => $e->getMessage(), 'code' => $e->getCode(), 'uri' => $uri, 'method' => $method]);
            }
        }

        return $this->responseBody;
    }

    public function getResponse(): array
    {
        return [
            'body' => $this->responseBody,
            'headers' => $this->responseHeader,
            'http_code' => $this->responseHttpCode,
            'client_error' => $this->responseClientError,
            'client_info' => $this->responseClientInfo
        ];
    }

    public function setLogger($logger): void
    {
        $this->logger = $logger;
    }

    public function getResponseBody(): string
    {
        return $this->responseBody;
    }

    public function getResponseHeader(): array
    {
        return $this->responseHeader;
    }

    public function getResponseHttpCode(): int
    {
        return $this->responseHttpCode;
    }

    public function getResponseClientError(): ?string
    {
        return $this->responseClientError;
    }

    public function getResponseClientInfo(): array
    {
        return $this->responseClientInfo;
    }

    public function getRequestArguments(): array
    {
        return $this->requestArguments;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements OAuth 1.0 authentication for interacting with the Twitter API, handling both GET and POST requests with proper parameter encoding and signature generation.

Class Description: TwitterAPIExchange is a PHP class that provides a convenient way to interact with Twitter's API using OAuth 1.0 authentication. It handles the construction of OAuth signatures, request headers, and performs HTTP requests using cURL.

Attributes:
- oauth_access_token: string - Twitter OAuth access token
- oauth_access_token_secret: string - Twitter OAuth access token secret
- consumer_key: string - Twitter API consumer key
- consumer_secret: string - Twitter API consumer secret
- postfields: array - Data to be sent in POST requests
- getfield: string - Query string for GET requests
- oauth: array - OAuth parameters for request signing
- url: string - API endpoint URL

Methods:
- __construct(array $settings) -> void - Constructor that validates and sets OAuth credentials
- setPostfields(array $array) -> self - Sets POST data and returns instance for method chaining
- setGetfield(string $string) -> self - Sets GET query string and returns instance for method chaining
- getGetfield() -> string|null - Returns current GET query string
- getPostfields() -> array|null - Returns current POST data
- buildOauth(string $url, string $requestMethod) -> self - Builds OAuth signature and parameters
- performRequest(bool $return = true) -> string|void - Executes the API request and returns response
- buildBaseString(string $baseURI, string $method, array $params) -> string - Private method to build base string for signature
- buildAuthorizationHeader(array $oauth) -> string - Private method to build OAuth header
wrong_result:
<?php
class TwitterAPIExchange {
    private $oauth_access_token;
    private $oauth_access_token_secret;
    private $consumer_key;
    private $consumer_secret;
    private $postfields;
    private $getfield;
    private $oauth;
    private $url;

    public function __construct(array $settings) {
        $this->oauth_access_token = $settings['oauth_access_token'];
        $this->oauth_access_token_secret = $settings['oauth_access_token_secret'];
        $this->consumer_key = $settings['consumer_key'];
        $this->consumer_secret = $settings['consumer_secret'];
    }

    public function setPostfields(array $array) {
        $this->postfields = $array;
        return $this;
    }

    public function setGetfield(string $string) {
        $this->getfield = $string;
        return $this;
    }

    public function getGetfield() {
        return $this->getfield;
    }

    public function getPostfields() {
        return $this->postfields;
    }

    public function buildOauth(string $url, string $requestMethod) {
        $this->url = $url;
        $this->oauth = array(
            "oauth_consumer_key" => $this->consumer_key,
            "oauth_nonce" => md5(microtime() . mt_rand(), true),
            "oauth_signature_method" => "HMAC-SHA1",
            "oauth_timestamp" => time(),
            "oauth_token" => $this->oauth_access_token,
            "oauth_version" => "1.0"
        );

        $params = array_merge($this->oauth, $this->getParameters());
        $baseString = $this->buildBaseString($url, $requestMethod, $params);
        $this->oauth["oauth_signature"] = $this->buildSignature($baseString, $params);

        return $this;
    }

    public function performRequest(bool $return = true) {
        $headers = array($this->buildAuthorizationHeader($this->oauth));
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->url . ($this->getfield ? '?' . $this->getfield : ''));
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, count($this->postfields) > 0);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, http_build_query($this->postfields));

        $response = curl_exec($ch);
        if ($return) {
            return $response;
        }
    }

    private function buildBaseString(string $baseURI, string $method, array $params) {
        $params = array_map('rawurlencode', $params);
        $params = array_map(function($k, $v) { return "$k=$v"; }, array_keys($params), $params);
        $params = implode('&', $params);
        return strtoupper($method) . '&' . rawurlencode($baseURI) . '&' . rawurlencode($params);
    }

    private function buildSignature(string $baseString, array $params) {
        $key = rawurlencode($this->consumer_secret) . '&' . rawurlencode($this->oauth_access_token_secret);
        return base64_encode(hash_hmac('sha1', $baseString, $key, true));
    }

    private function buildAuthorizationHeader(array $oauth) {
        $oauth = array_map('rawurlencode', $oauth);
        $oauth = array_map(function($k, $v) { return "$k=\"$v\""; }, array_keys($oauth), $oauth);
        return 'Authorization: OAuth ' . implode(', ', $oauth);
    }

    private function getParameters() {
        $params = [];
        if ($this->getfield) {
            parse_str($this->getfield, $params);
        }
        if ($this->postfields) {
            $params = array_merge($params, $this->postfields);
        }
        return $params;
    }
}
?>

<?php
class requests {
    const VERSION = '1.0';

    protected static $ch = null;
    protected static $timeout = 30;
    protected static $encoding = null;
    protected static $output_encoding = null;
    protected static $cookies = array();
    protected static $rawheaders = array();
    protected static $domain_cookies = array();
    protected static $headers = array();
    protected static $useragents = array();
    protected static $client_ips = array();
    protected static $proxies = array();
    protected static $raw = '';
    protected static $head = '';
    protected static $content = '';
    protected static $text = '';
    protected static $info = array();
    protected static $history = 0;
    protected static $status_code = 0;
    protected static $error = '';

    public static function init() {
        self::$ch = curl_init();
        return self::$ch;
    }

    public static function request($url, $method = 'GET', $fields = array(), $files = array(), $allow_redirects = true, $cert = null) {
        if (!self::_is_url($url)) {
            self::$error = "Invalid URL: $url";
            return false;
        }

        self::init();

        $options = array(
            CURLOPT_URL => $url,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
            CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => self::$timeout,
            CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => $allow_redirects,
            CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
            CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER => false,
            CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST => 0,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $method,
            CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => $fields,
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => self::$rawheaders
        );

        if ($cert) {
            $options[CURLOPT_SSLCERT] = $cert;
        }

        if (self::$proxies) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = self::$proxies[0];
        }

        curl_setopt_array(self::$ch, $options);

        if ($files) {
            $multipart = array();
            foreach ($files as $name => $file) {
                $multipart[] = array(
                    'name' => $name,
                    'contents' => fopen($file['tmp_name'], 'r'),
                    'filename' => $file['name']
                );
            }
            curl_setopt(self::$ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, new CURLFile($multipart));
        }

        self::$raw = curl_exec(self::$ch);
        self::$info = curl_getinfo(self::$ch);
        self::$status_code = self::$info['http_code'];
        self::$error = curl_error(self::$ch);

        if (self::$error) {
            return false;
        }

        list(self::$head, self::$content) = self::split_header_body();

        self::get_response_headers(self::$head);
        self::get_response_cookies(self::$head, parse_url($url, PHP_URL_HOST));

        self::$text = self::$content;

        if (self::$output_encoding && self::$content) {
            self::$text = mb_convert_encoding(self::$content, self::$output_encoding, self::$encoding);
        }

        return self::$text;
    }

    protected static function _is_url($url) {
        return filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL) !== false;
    }

    public static function get_cookies($domain = '') {
        if ($domain) {
            return self::$domain_cookies[$domain] ?? array();
        }
        return self::$cookies;
    }

    public static function get_response_headers($header) {
        $headers = array();
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        self::$headers = $headers;
        return $headers;
    }

    public static function get_response_cookies($header, $domain) {
        $cookies = array();
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (stripos($line, 'Set-Cookie:') === 0) {
                $cookie = substr($line, 11);
                $parts = explode(';', $cookie);
                $cookie_parts = explode('=', $parts[0], 2);
                $name = trim($cookie_parts[0]);
                $value = trim($cookie_parts[1] ?? '');
                $attrs = array();
                foreach (array_slice($parts, 1) as $part) {
                    $attr = trim($part);
                    if (strpos($attr, '=') !== false) {
                        list($k, $v) = explode('=', $attr, 2);
                        $attrs[trim($k)] = trim($v);
                    } else {
                        $attrs[trim($attr)] = true;
                    }
                }
                $cookies[$name] = array(
                    'value' => $value,
                    'attributes' => $attrs
                );
            }
        }
        self::$domain_cookies[$domain] = $cookies;
        return $cookies;
    }

    public static function split_header_body() {
        $parts = explode("\r\n\r\n", self::$raw, 2);
        return $parts;
    }

    public static function get_history($header) {
        $history = 0;
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $header);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (preg_match('/^HTTP\/\d+\.\d+ (\d+)/', $line, $match)) {
                $code = (int)$match[1];
                if ($code >= 300 && $code < 400) {
                    $history++;
                }
            }
        }
        self::$history = $history;
        return $history;
    }

        }
        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $this->request_url,
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => $headers,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
            CURLOPT_USERAGENT => $this->useragent,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $this->method,
            CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => $this->request_body,
            CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION => [$this, 'streamWriteCallback'],
            CURLOPT_READFUNCTION => [$this, 'streamReadCallback'],
        ];
        if ($this->proxy !== null) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = $this->proxy;
        }
        if ($this->username !== null && $this->password !== null) {
            $options[CURLOPT_USERPWD] = $this->username . ':' . $this->password;
        }
        if ($this->curlopts !== null) {
            $options = array_merge($options, $this->curlopts);
        }
        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $options);
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function sendRequest($parse = false) {
        $this->prepRequest();
        $this->response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        if ($this->response === false) {
            $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle);
            $this->response_code = curl_errno($this->curl_handle);
            return false;
        }
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = $this->response_info['http_code'];
        if ($parse) {
            $this->processResponse($this->curl_handle, $this->response);
        }
        return $this->response;
    }

    public function processResponse($curl_handle, $response) {
        $header_size = $this->response_info['header_size'];
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        return $this->response;
    }

    public function isBaeEnv() {
        return defined('BAE_ENV_APPID');
    }

    public function getResponseHeader($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }
        $headers = explode("\r\n", $this->response_headers);
        foreach ($headers as $h) {
            if (strpos($h, $header . ':') === 0) {
                return trim(substr($h, strlen($header) + 1));
            }
        }
        return null;
    }

    public function getResponseBody() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function getResponseCode() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }

    private function streamWriteCallback($ch, $data) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback !== null) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $ch, $data);
        }
        if ($this->write_stream !== null) {
            fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
            return strlen($data);
        }
        if ($this->write_file !== null) {
            file_put_contents($this->write_file, $data, FILE_APPEND);
            return strlen($data);
        }
        return 0;
    }

    private function streamReadCallback($ch, $length) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback !== null) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $ch, $length);
        }
        if ($this->read_stream !== null) {
            $data = fread($this->read_stream, $length);
            $this->read_stream_read += strlen($data);
            return $data;
        }
        if ($this->read_file !== null) {
            $data = fread(fopen($this->read_file, 'r'), $length);
            $this->read_stream_read += strlen($data);
            return $data;
        }
        return '';
    }
}
?>

Task Description: Create a PHP class that utilizes the Guzzle HTTP client to synchronize video processing tasks with a remote API endpoint, handling request signing and response parsing.

Class Description: The SyncVideo class provides functionality to send video processing requests to a remote API endpoint using HTTP POST requests. It handles request signing, timeout configuration, and response parsing.

Attributes:
- config: [Upyun\Config] - Configuration object containing service credentials, timeout settings, and endpoint information

Methods:
- __construct(Config $config) -> [void] - Initializes the class with the provided configuration object
- process(array $params, string $path) -> [array] - Sends a synchronized video processing request to the specified path with the given parameters, returns the parsed JSON response
wrong_result:
<?php

namespace Upyun;

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException;

class SyncVideo
{
    protected $config;

    public function __construct(Config $config)
    {
        $this->config = $config;
    }

    public function process(array $params, string $path): array
    {
        $endpoint = $this->config->getEndpoint();
        $timeout = $this->config->getTimeout();

        $client = new Client([
            'base_uri' => $endpoint,
            'timeout' => $timeout,
        ]);

        $headers = $this->generateHeaders($params);

        try {
            $response = $client->post($path, [
                'headers' => $headers,
                'form_params' => $params,
            ]);

            return json_decode($response->getBody(), true);
        } catch (RequestException $e) {
            throw new \Exception("Request failed: " . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }

    private function generateHeaders(array $params): array
    {
        $accessKey = $this->config->getAccessKey();
        $secretKey = $this->config->getSecretKey();

        $timestamp = time();
        $signature = hash_hmac('sha1', $timestamp . $params['video_id'], $secretKey);

        return [
            'Authorization' => "Upyun $accessKey:$signature",
            'X-Upyun-Timestamp' => $timestamp,
        ];
    }
}

        return fread($file_handle, $length);

        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);

        foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {

        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        if ($this->method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);

            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        }
        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "$this->username:$this->password");
        }
        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $opt => $val) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $opt, $val);
            }
        }
        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_read_callback']);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READDATA, $this->read_stream);
            if ($this->read_stream_size !== null) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
            }
        }
        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, $this->write_stream);
        }
        if ($this->debug_mode) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
        }
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if ($curl_handle === null) {
            $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        }
        if ($response === null) {
            $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        }
        $this->response = $response;
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = [];
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        $headers = explode("\r\n", substr($response, 0, $header_size));
        foreach ($headers as $header) {
            if (strpos($header, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $header, 2);
                $this->response_headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = true) {
        $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $response);
        return $parse ? $this->response_body : $this->response;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }
        return isset($this->response_headers[$header]) ? $this->response_headers[$header] : null;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

    public function set_request_url($url) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_curlopts($curlopts) {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream_size($size) {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream($resource, $size = null) {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        if ($size !== null) {
            $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_file($location) {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_stream($resource) {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_file($location) {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_proxy($proxy) {
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position) {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $curl_handle, $file_handle, $length);
        }
        return fread($file_handle, $length);
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
        }
        return fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        $headers = [];
        foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
            $headers[] = "$key: $value";
        }
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, false);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $this->timeout);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $this->connect_timeout);
        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy);
        }
        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "$this->username:$this->password");
        }
        if ($this->request_body) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        }
        if ($this->method === 'POST') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        } elseif ($this->method === 'DELETE') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
        } elseif ($this->method === 'HEAD') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, true);
        }
        if ($this->read_file) {
            $this->read_stream = fopen($this->read_file, 'rb');
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_read_callback']);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, filesize($this->read_file));
        }
        if ($this->write_file) {
            $this->write_stream = fopen($this->write_file, 'wb');
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_stream);
        }
        if ($this->cacert_location) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->cacert_location);
        }
        if (!$this->ssl_verification) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);
        }
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $option => $value) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $option, $value);
            }
        }
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if ($curl_handle === null) {
            $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        }
        if ($response === null) {
            $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        }
        $this->response = $response;
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = [];
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        $headers = explode("\r\n", substr($response, 0, $header_size));
        foreach ($headers as $header) {
            if (strpos($header, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $header, 2);
                $this->response_headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false) {
        $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $response);
        if ($parse) {
            return $this->response_body;
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_multi_request($handles, $opt = null) {
        $mh = curl_multi_init();
        $results = [];
        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            curl_multi_add_handle($mh, $handle->curl_handle);
        }
        $running = null;
        do {
            curl_multi_exec($mh, $running);
            curl_multi_select($mh);
        } while ($running > 0);
        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            $handle->process_response($handle->curl_handle);
            $results[] = $handle;
        }
        curl_multi_close($mh);
        return $results;
    }
}
?>

Task Description: Create a PHP class that utilizes the Guzzle HTTP client to fetch content from a URL and load it into a DOM object.

Class Description: The `Dom` class provides functionality to load HTML content from a URL using the Guzzle HTTP client. It allows for optional customization of the HTTP client and request objects, and handles the response to extract the content for DOM processing.

Methods:

Method1: `loadFromUrl(string $url, ?Options $options = null, ?ClientInterface $client = null, ?RequestInterface $request = null)` -> `Dom` - Loads HTML content from the specified URL using the provided or default Guzzle HTTP client and request objects. The content is then loaded into a DOM object. Throws various exceptions for error handling.

Input Parameters:
- `$url`: string - The URL from which to fetch the HTML content.
- `$options`: ?Options - Optional configuration options for the DOM loading process.
- `$client`: ?ClientInterface - Optional Guzzle HTTP client instance. If not provided, a default client is created.
- `$request`: ?RequestInterface - Optional Guzzle HTTP request instance. If not provided, a default GET request is created.

Output:
- Returns an instance of `Dom` with the loaded HTML content.
wrong_result:
<?php

namespace App;

use GuzzleHttp\ClientInterface;
use GuzzleHttp\RequestInterface;
use Symfony\Component\DomCrawler\Crawler;

class Dom
{
    private $crawler;

    public function loadFromUrl(string $url, ?Options $options = null, ?ClientInterface $client = null, ?RequestInterface $request = null): self
    {
        $client = $client ?: new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
        $request = $request ?: $client->createRequest('GET', $url);

        try {
            $response = $client->send($request);
            $content = (string) $response->getBody();
            $this->crawler = new Crawler($content);
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            throw new \RuntimeException("Failed to load URL: {$url}", 0, $e);
        }

        return $this;
    }

    public function getCrawler(): Crawler
    {
        return $this->crawler;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that handles webhook triggering using Guzzle HTTP client, including formatting headers and payload data, and processing responses or errors.

Class Description: The WebhookService class provides functionality to trigger webhooks by sending HTTP requests to specified endpoints. It handles request configuration, response processing, and error handling.

- formatHeaders(array $headers) -> [array] - Formats headers array into key-value pairs
  Parameters:
    - $headers: [array] - Raw headers array to be formatted
  Returns:

- formatPayload($payload) -> [array|string] - Formats payload data into key-value pairs

    - $payload: [mixed] - Raw payload data to be formatted

<?php
class WebhookService {
    private $client;

    public function __construct() {
        $this->client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
    }

    public function triggerWebhook($data) {
        $method = $data['method'] ?? 'POST';
        $endpoint = $data['endpoint'] ?? '';
        $headers = $this->formatHeaders($data['headers'] ?? []);
        $payload = $this->formatPayload($data['payload'] ?? []);

        try {
            $response = $this->client->request($method, $endpoint, [
                'headers' => $headers,
                'json' => $payload
            ]);

            return ['status' => 'success', 'content' => $response->getBody()->getContents()];
        } catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\RequestException $e) {
            return ['status' => 'error', 'content' => $e->getMessage()];
        }
    }

    private function formatHeaders(array $headers) {
        $formatted = [];
        foreach ($headers as $key => $value) {
            $formatted[$key] = $value;
        }
        return $formatted;
    }

    private function formatPayload($payload) {
        if (is_array($payload)) {
            $formatted = [];
            foreach ($payload as $key => $value) {
                $formatted[$key] = $value;
            }
            return $formatted;
        }
        return $payload;
    }
}

        if ($this->proxy) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = $this->proxy;
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            $options[CURLOPT_USERPWD] = $this->username . ':' . $this->password;
        }

        if ($this->request_headers) {
            $headers = [];
            foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
                $headers[] = "$key: $value";
            }
            $options[CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER] = $headers;
        }

        if ($this->method === 'POST' || $this->method === 'PUT') {
            $options[CURLOPT_POST] = true;
            $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $this->request_body;
        }

        if ($this->read_file) {
            $this->read_stream = fopen($this->read_file, 'rb');
            $options[CURLOPT_READFUNCTION] = [$this, 'streaming_read_callback'];
            $options[CURLOPT_INFILE] = $this->read_stream;
            $options[CURLOPT_INFILESIZE] = $this->read_stream_size;
        }

        if ($this->write_file) {
            $this->write_stream = fopen($this->write_file, 'wb');
            $options[CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION] = [$this, 'streaming_write_callback'];
            $options[CURLOPT_FILE] = $this->write_stream;
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                $options[$key] = $value;
            }
        }

        if ($this->debug_mode) {
            $options[CURLOPT_VERBOSE] = true;
        }

        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $options);
    }

    private function parse_response_headers($response) {
        $headers = [];
        $header_text = substr($response, 0, $this->response_info['header_size']);
        $header_lines = explode("\r\n", $header_text);
        foreach ($header_lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }
}
?>
